title: New: Boyish – Dress Up, Make Up
content:
Japan’s Boyish sound more British than the vast majority of bands from the UK.

Whether that’s down to their Cure-style vocals, Smiths inspired guitar lines or charmingly innocent songwriting, they’re also a whole lot better than the current crop of middle of the road, mid-00’s replicating indie acts. Newest track Dress Up, Make Up is all cotton-candy and wide-eyed girls; pirouetting under the gaze of a wistful moon, tied up in the sort of melodies that only the 80’s dreamt of, check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
